TOOLTIP_ALL_IMPORTANT.description: Make all words inside language block important

TOOLTIP_NO_IMPORTANT.description: Remove important mark from all words inside language block

TOOLTIP_REMOVE_ALL.description: Remove all words inside language block

TOOLTIP_CHANGE_IMPORTANT.description: Change important status for the WordItem

TOOLTIP_REMOVE.description: Remove the WordItem form the list

TOOLTIP_TEXT_CONTEXT.description: Show panle with contexts for the wordItem
